title: Automated Software Test Framework - Python
description: An automated test framework for unit testing of Washer Disinfectors using Python

title: Chemical Reaction Kinetics Formulation Automation - Python/MATLAB
description: A software tool to automate the formulation of Peracetic Acid chemistries by modeling the chemical reaction kinetics and predicting outcomes.

title: ISO 15883 Scope Testing
description: Laboratory scope testing of soil testing on endoscopes and cleaning efficacy of endoscope washer disinfectors.

title: Green Sterilant Formulation
description: Development of a greener sterilant/disinfectant meant for use in washer disinfectors for cleaning endoscopes.
